summary.span: 表示在使用 活动引发事件时发送的数据。

span.span: Represents the data sent when an event is raised using the activity.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从派生类的构造函数调用基 构造函数。The following example shows how to call the base constructor from a derived class' constructor. 此示例摘自“订单状态机”SDK 示例。This example is from the Ordering State Machine SDK sample. 有关详细信息，请参阅[排序状态机示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59272cf4-bc98-439c-bcfa-b66999ebce5c)。For more information, see [Ordering State Machine Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59272cf4-bc98-439c-bcfa-b66999ebce5c). MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Identity { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置引发事件的用户的标识。

span.span: Gets or sets the identity of the user that raised the event.

value.span: 引发事件的用户的标识。

span.span: The identity of the user that is raising the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性由 活动进行计算。This property is evaluated by the activity. 如果在此活动的 属性中设置的值与用户标识关联的任何角色都不匹配，则不允许执行此活动。If the value that is set in the property of this activity does not match any of the roles associated with the user identity, the activity is not allowed to execute. 引发事件的实体可以是人或计算机。The entity that raises the event can be a person or a computer. “角色”功能使用标识来确保允许此标识向此工作流提交数据。Identity is used by the Roles functionality to ensure that this identity is allowed to submit data to this workflow.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Guid InstanceId { Guid get(); void set(Guid value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置包含应处理该事件的 的工作流实例的工作流实例标识符。

value.span: 包含应处理该事件的 的工作流实例的工作流实例标识符。

span.span: The workflow instance identifier for the workflow instance that contains the that is expected to handle the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个必需的属性。This is a required property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool WaitForIdle { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置值，该值指示是应立即引发事件，还是工作流在引发事件前应处于空闲状态。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the event should be raised immediately, or if the workflow should go idle before raising the event.

value.span: 如果工作流在引发事件前应处于空闲状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the workflow should go idle before raising the event; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 `false`。The default value is `false`. 值为 `true` 指示使用 将数据提交到工作流。A value of `true` indicates that data was submitted to the workflow using . 值为 `false` 指示使用 将数据提交到工作流。A value of `false` indicates that data was submitted to the workflow using .
